channel.title: Table by custom js doesn't work
channel.description:
other charts are ok,such as bar,scatter etc.but table looks like special.When I try to copy codes from [plotly examples](https://plotly.com/javascript/table/),it becomes weird. ![微信图片_20220828210947|690x311](upload://hyVmtG1lELCI8gqGebZcg0HQoYf.png)
By the way,i don't use redash's table,because i can't change the table to take up just one column in dashboard.For me,it's too wide.And also i can't change the default column number of grid.Sad,it stops.[relevant post](http://discuss.redash.io/t/even-more-flexible-grid-in-dashboards/5044)

item.title: Table by custom js doesn't work

other charts are ok,such as bar,scatter etc.but table looks like special.When I try to copy codes from plotly examples,it becomes weird.

By the way,i don’t use redash’s table,because i can’t change the table to take up just one column in dashboard.For me,it’s too wide.And also i can’t change the default column number of grid.Sad,it stops.relevant post
